text:
Watch: Yes, you can drift horse carriages in Assassin's Creed: Syndicate 
Published By: Eurogamer.net - Today 
Assassin's Creed: Syndicate lets you drift horse carriages, Fast and the Furious-style, around London's narrow street corners.There's even a...
